description:
What You Will Be Doing

  • Develop and implement holistic e-commerce strategies aligned with company goals.
  • Drive revenue growth through effective merchandising and promotions.
  • Analyze sales data, customer behavior, and market trends.
  • Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) to assess e-commerce initiatives.
  • Oversee website, navigation and functionality to enhance user experience.
  • Collaborate with design and development teams to implement user-friendly features.
  • Manage and direct E-commerce Associate Merchandiser in the set up of products and pricing.
  • Execute SEO content strategy with the SEO agency.
  • Utilize analytics tools for insights, tracking performance, and generating reports.
  • Launch new product listings, landing pages, campaigns, and promotions.
  • Work on Shopify content improvements and app integrations.

Experience You Will Need

  • Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, E-commerce, or related field.
  • 2+ years of proven e-commerce management experience.
  • Strong understanding of Shopify, digital marketing, SEO, SEM, and social media.
  • Proficiency in using Shopify e-commerce platforms.
  • Analytical mindset, coupled with excellent communication and project management skills.
  • Must be detail-oriented and committed to delivering high-quality results within deadlines.
  • Experience in the apparel industry is a plus.
